shortdesc.ph: The statistics of the local video stream.

p.codeblock: public static class LocalVideoStats { public int uid; public int sentBitrate; public int sentFrameRate; public int encoderOutputFrameRate; public int rendererOutputFrameRate; public int targetBitrate; public int targetFrameRate; public int encodedBitrate; public int encodedFrameWidth; public int encodedFrameHeight; public int encodedFrameCount; public int codecType; }

__attribute__((visibility("default"))) @interface AgoraRtcLocalVideoStats : NSObject @property(assign, nonatomic) NSUInteger sentBitrate; @property(assign, nonatomic) NSUInteger sentFrameRate; @property(assign, nonatomic) NSUInteger uid; @property(assign, nonatomic) NSInteger encoderOutputFrameRate; @property(assign, nonatomic) NSInteger rendererOutputFrameRate; @property(assign, nonatomic) NSInteger targetFrameRate; @property(assign, nonatomic) NSInteger targetBitrate; @property(assign, nonatomic) NSInteger encodedBitrate; @property(assign, nonatomic) NSInteger encodedFrameWidth; @property(assign, nonatomic) NSInteger encodedFrameHeight; @property(assign, nonatomic) NSInteger encodedFrameCount; @property(assign, nonatomic) AgoraVideoCodecType codecType; @end

struct LocalVideoStats { int sentBitrate; int sentFrameRate; int encoderOutputFrameRate; int rendererOutputFrameRate; int targetBitrate; int targetFrameRate; QUALITY_ADAPT_INDICATION qualityAdaptIndication; int encodedBitrate; int encodedFrameWidth; int encodedFrameHeight; int encodedFrameCount; VIDEO_CODEC_TYPE codecType; unsigned short txPacketLossRate; int captureFrameRate; CAPTURE_BRIGHTNESS_LEVEL_TYPE captureBrightnessLevel; };

export interface LocalVideoStats { sentBitrate: number; sentFrameRate: number; encoderOutputFrameRate: number; rendererOutputFrameRate: number; targetBitrate: number; targetFrameRate: number; qualityAdaptIndication: QUALITY_ADAPT_INDICATION; encodedBitrate: number; encodedFrameWidth: number; encodedFrameHeight: number; encodedFrameCount: number; codecType: VIDEO_CODEC_TYPE; txPacketLossRate: number; captureFrameRate: number; captureBrightnessLevel: CAPTURE_BRIGHTNESS_LEVEL_TYPE; }

plentry.pd: The ID of the local user.

pd.p: The actual bitrate (Kbps) while sending the local video stream.This value does not include the bitrate while resending the video after packet loss.

plentry.pd: The actual frame rate (Kbps) while sending the local video stream.This value does not include the frame rate while resending the video after packet loss.
The output frame rate (fps) of the local video encoder.
The output frame rate (fps) of the local video renderer.
The target bitrate (Kbps) of the current encoder. This is an estimate made by the SDK based on the current network conditions.
The target frame rate (fps) of the current encoder.
Quality adaption of the local video stream in the reported interval (in terms of the target frame rate and target bitrate). For details, see .

pd.p: The bitrate (Kbps) while encoding the local video stream.This value does not include the bitrate while resending the video after packet loss.

plentry.pd: The width of the encoded video (px).
The height of the encoded video (px).
The number of sent video frames, represented by an aggregate value.

pd.p: The codec type of the local video stream. See .

plentry.pd: The video packet loss rate (%) from the local client to the Agora edge server before applying the anti-packet loss strategies.
The capture frame rate (fps) of the local video stream.

pd.p: The brightness level of the video image captured by the local camera. For details, see .
